Finally !!! It only took 3 months to come in theaters but it s finally here. This movie is a raunch fest If there was any movie that would take the c rown for being a raunchy dirty comedy movie it would be this. Seth Rogen and his team h as crea ted a movie like no other He really challenged the audience s expectations.
